languages.text: В кадре появляется еще один человек — запыхавшийся младший офицер с ворохом свитков в руках. Мастер вокса кивает в его сторону. "А вот и отчеты, Лорд-капитан. Если вы сочтете возможным вернуться на свой пост, я немедленно доложу вам о состоянии дел на корабле..."

traits.locale_text: К Мастеру Вокса подбегает запыхавшийся бегун и передает неколько свитков. "Вот и отчеты, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find yourself able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."
languages.original_text: В кадре появляется еще один человек — запыхавшийся младший офицер с ворохом свитков в руках. Мастер вокса кивает в его сторону. "А вот и отчеты, Лорд-капитан. Если вы сочтете возможным вернуться на свой пост, я немедленно доложу вам о состоянии дел на корабле..."

traits.locale_text: Another man appears in the frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find it possible to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

Another man appears in the frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find it possible to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

If you find able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find yourself able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

languages.text: Otro hombre aparece en la imagen. Un oficial de baja graduación, exhausto, lleva un montón de pergaminos. «Ah, por fin llegan los informes, Lord Capitán. Si puede volver a su puesto, le informaré de la situación de la nave inmediatamente».
languages.original_text: Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find yourself able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

traits.locale_text: Otro hombre aparece en la imagen. Un oficial de baja graduación, exhausto, lleva un montón de pergaminos. «Ah, por fin llegan los informes, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Si puede volver a su puesto, le informaré de la situación de la nave inmediatamente».

languages.text: 另一个人出现在视讯屏幕中。那是位低阶军官，手里拿着一堆卷轴，上气不接下气。音阵大师朝他点了点头。“啊，报告都在这里，舰长大人。如果您能返回到指挥席的话，我可以立即向您汇报一下飞船的大概情况……”
languages.original_text: Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find yourself able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

traits.locale_text: 另一个人出现在屏幕中。那是位低阶军官，手里拿着一堆卷轴，上气不接下气。音阵大师朝他点了点头。“啊，报告都在这里，舰长大人。如果您能返回到指挥席的话，我可以立即向您汇报一下飞船的大概情况……”

languages.text: 映像フレームには別の男が登場した。下級士官がすっかり息を切らし、山のような巻物を抱えている。ヴォクス・マスターは男に頷く。「ああ、これは報告書です、ロード・キャプテン。陛下が無事ステーションに戻った暁には、すぐに船内の状況の概要をお伝えできますよ…」
languages.original_text: Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find yourself able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

traits.locale_text: 映像フレームには別の男が登場した。下級士官がすっかり息を切らし、山のような巻物を抱えている。ヴォクス・マスターは男に頷く。「ああ、これは報告書です、ロード・キャプテン。陛下が無事ステーションに戻った暁には、すぐに船内の状況の概要をお伝えできますよ…」

languages.text: Ein weiterer Mann erscheint im Bild – ein junger Offizier, völlig außer Atem, der einen Haufen Schriftrollen trägt. Die Voxmeisterin nickt ihm zu. "Ah, hier sind die Berichte, Lord Captain. Wenn Ihr in der Lage seid, auf Eure Station zurückzukehren, kann ich Euch sofort einen Überblick über den Stand der Dinge auf dem Schiff geben."
languages.original_text: Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find yourself able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

languages.text: Un autre homme apparaît sur la pictocapture : un officier subalterne à bout de souffle qui tient une pile de parchemins. La maîtresse-vox lui adresse un signe de tête. « Ah, voilà les rapports, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Si vous êtes en mesure de retourner à votre poste, je pourrai vous récapituler immédiatement la situation à bord du vaisseau... »
languages.original_text: Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find yourself able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

traits.locale_text: Un autre homme apparaît sur la pictocapture : un officier subalterne à bout de souffle qui tient une pile de parchemins. La maîtresse-vox lui adresse un signe de tête. « Ah, voilà les rapports, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Si vous êtes en mesure de retourner à votre poste, je pourrai vous récapituler immédiatement la situation à bord du vaisseau... »

languages.text: Foto karesinde bir başka adam beliriyor. Nefes nefese kalmış, bir yığın tomar taşıyan kıdemsiz bir subay... Voks Üstadı başıyla adamı işaret ediyor. "Raporlar da geldi Lord Kaptan. Mevkinize geri dönebilecek durumdaysanız derhâl size gemideki durumun özetini geçebilirim..."
languages.original_text: Another man appears in the pict frame — a junior officer, completely out of breath, carrying a heap of scrolls. The Vox Master nods at him. "Ah, here are the reports, Lord Captain. If you find yourself able to return to your station, I can immediately give you a rundown of the state of affairs on the ship..."

traits.locale_text: Foto karesinde bir başka adam beliriyor. Nefes nefese kalmış, bir yığın tomar taşıyan kıdemsiz bir subay... Voks Üstadı bir tamam işaretiyle tomarları alıyor. "İşte, raporlar da geldi Lord Kaptan. Mevkinize geri dönebilecek durumdaysanız size gemideki durumun bir özetini geçebilirim hemen..."
